attributes.action: legislate so that both public and private bodies may only increase the charges they levy to a maximum of 50% over the offical rate of inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the governments inflation figures state that inflation is running at under 3%. We have seen electricity and gas charges increase by over 30% in the last 2 years. Petrol prices have increased by over 10% in the last year. Council tax has on average increased by over 5% year on year. Food prices have increased by over 10% in the last 6 months. We petition the prime minister to legislate that companies and local government may only increase the charges they levy to a maximum of 50% over the official rate of inflation per annum.
